title: Configure Inter and Space Mono Fonts
description: Set up Inter as primary font and Space Mono for monospace using next/font

objective.what: Configure Inter and Space Mono fonts using next/font/google for optimal loading
objective.why: Consistent typography is essential for the Resonant brand - Inter for readability, Space Mono for code
objective.outcome: Fonts properly loaded with CSS variables --font-sans and --font-mono

usage.inter: All body text, headings, UI elements
usage.spaceMono: Code blocks, workflow IDs, technical data

prompt.mission: Configure custom fonts for Resonant.ai using next/font
tasks: Import Inter and Space_Mono from next/font/google
Apply font variables to html element className
Set body to use font-sans by default
constraints: MUST use next/font (not CDN or local files)
MUST set display: swap for performance
Inter for sans-serif, Space Mono for monospace

automated: No font loading errors in console
functional: Code blocks render in Space Mono
